plot: During the 16th century Wallachia's ruler,Michael the Brave,dreams of uniting the Principalities of Wallachia,Transylvania and Moldavia into a single united country later to be known as Romania.
title: Buzduganul cu trei peceti
plot_es: During the 16th century Wallachia's ruler,Michael the Brave,dreams of uniting the Principalities of Wallachia,Transylvania and Moldavia into a single united country later to be known as Romania.
plot_en: During the 16th century Wallachia's ruler,Michael the Brave,dreams of uniting the Principalities of Wallachia,Transylvania and Moldavia into a single united country later to be known as Romania.
